forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a sunlit canopy, casting a soft glow on the bustling streets below. The high temperature skirts around a mild 67 degrees, settling comfortably as afternoon descends. A gentle west wind dances through the neighborhoods, carrying hints of the ocean's embrace, while the clouds from yesterday's veil have graciously retreated, leaving only the occasional puff of white to sail against the azure. Tonight, the sky will remain mostly clear, with temperatures dipping to a relaxing 57 degrees, perfect for a calm evening stroll or enjoying the sights from a cozy café.

Even though this shimmering day gives a nod to clarity, whispers of the marine layer might linger close to the Golden Gate, creating a mystique on the horizon. It’s advisable to layer your attire; a light jacket will serve well as the evening sets in, completing a comfortable ensemble for exploring the city's nooks. A quiet walk through the Presidio or a leisurely visit to one of the local art galleries could enhance your experience, each moment steeped in the city's unique charm, as the warmth of the sun gives way to the cooler embrace of twilight.
